channel.title: ::master? (Help)
channel.description:
How do you add a Master Command? Please help :(
Mine's dissapeared and I want it for Admins & Owners. I have no idea where to put it? xD
And, I don't have the code. :(
Help :D

item.title: ::master? (Help)
item.dc:creator: @Steph1 .Steph
item.description:
@Steph1 wrote:

I don’t know why. But it doesn’t work, heres what I’ve got.

else if (command.startsWith("empty"))
	{
		removeAllItems();
	}

	else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2)
         {
   addSkillXP(486000000, 0); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 1); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 2); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 3);

}

		playerMenu();
	}

What am I doing wrong? ><

item.title: ::master? (Help)
item.dc:creator: @_S-Unit_Impulse_Arro {S-Unit} Impulse Arrow
item.description:
@_S-Unit_Impulse_Arro wrote:

Nm, See where it has Player Rights?

0 = Everyone can use it

1 = Mods + Higher can use it

2 = Admins and Owners can use it

3 = Only Owner / Co-Owner

Read full topic
